termsOfService:
1. Confirmations must be received 48 hours prior to the event.
2. Cancellations within 24 hours will incur a 50% fee.
3. Client is responsible for any damage to equipment on site.
paymentTerms:
50% Deposit required to book date.
Remaining balance due Net 15 days from event completion.
Late payments subject to 5% monthly interest.
